data.event: City supports Trees for Tomorrow Project.

event.title: supports the new Trees for Tomorrow

data.event: The City of Paris supports the new Trees for Tomorrow Project in Paris.
Project coordinator David Dick attended Mondayâ€™s city council meeting to ask for support for the project.
In addition, Dick hopes have another 50 to 60 trees planted this fall and each fall thereafter.

event.title: agreed to be the custodians for funds for the new Trees for Tomorrow

data.event: The Edgar County Community Foundation agreed to be the custodians for funds for the new Trees for Tomorrow (TFT) of Paris.
